actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the Santa Margarita project, California, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the Santa Margarita project, California. Authorizes to be appropriated for construction of the project the sum of $48,700,000.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the Santa Margarita project, California, and for other purposes.
